short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This companion Chrome Extension for Deep Freeze MDM must be installed for Chromebook Management functionality to work properly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Deep Freeze MDM Chrome extension is required on managed Chromebooks in order to use all features of Deep Freeze Chrome MDM.

Deep Freeze MDM provides cloud-based, over-the-air Mobile Device Management (MDM). It allows to administer deployments of Chromebook, iOS and Android devices through a powerful web-based console. Deep Freeze MDM is designed for businesses that want to spend less time and effort to manage and secure mobile devices. Keep users productive, business data safe, and personal data private.

Learn more at http://www.faronics.com/deep-freeze-mdm
